title: Can we give expiation money (for broken oath) overseas or in another country | assimalhakeem -JAL
transcript: namira from georgia says if a person has broken an oath and he has to give expiation is it possible to give the expiration in another country so someone in georgia we don't know whether there are muslims there or not and whether they're needy or not can we send the expiation money to pakistan for example or to bangladesh there is no problem in doing that in sha allah you
